name: D.E.R.O: Dodge Every RED Object
description:
Dodge. Every. Red. Object. Sounds easy, right? Well, what if there were bouncing, chasing, expanding, flashing, and even slicing objects? Sound easy, now?

Move your mouse to avoid red objects (works with touchscreen).

Try to beat the cloud high score!

Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/deRo/764579

A game by dychdid
